content: A number of us have posted here with the same problem. Are you with Optus, by any chance?
creator: thewordygecko

content: There is no setting for it; it happens when you press Shift-Delete. There is also an add-on: https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/confirmbeforedelete/, but it only works on versions up to 137.
creator: siffemoz
